Documentation.TagDescription:
**Service Request Management**

Comprehensive service request lifecycle management. Track customer issues, assign technicians, monitor progress, and maintain service quality metrics.

MethodDocumentation.GET: Access customer support tickets and service cases with filtering by status, priority, or assignment.
MethodDocumentation.POST: Log new customer issues or service requests with automatic assignment and tracking setup.
MethodDocumentation.PUT: Update ticket status, priority levels, or reassign cases to different technicians or departments.
